TopicTitle: Stock Visual Enhancements Issue: Clouds disappearing

Articles.Content:
Hey I'm having a problem with getting Stock Visual Enhancements to work. Everything seems to work fine at first, but between around 50km to 150km in altitude, the clouds disappear. Everything else, however, is visible. The cloud shadows and city lights are fine, but the clouds disappear. I tried using the default BoulderCo configs, but I had the same problem, so the problem is probably coming from EVE itself.

Screenshot in game: https://imgur.com/a/GEMM6j7

I'm running KSP 1.3.1 with EVE 1.2.2.1, SVE 1.2.9.0 w/High Res Textures, Module Manager 3.0.4, and Kopernicus 1.3.1.7.

Screenshot of gamedata folder: https://imgur.com/a/6o7kLvx

Here are my logs: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ji6fyoz6tpq3npu/KSP.log?dl=0

Edited September 9, 2018 by cosekantphi
